item.title: How to load new interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mike42107 mike42107
item.description:
@mike42107 wrote:

what i want to do is to load the exchange interface this is what i got im prolly way off so just please help

[code]public static void Exchange(RSFont[] TDA) {
RSInterface Interface = addInterface(27679);

addSprite(27001, 1, "Interfaces/Exchange/BACKGROUND");



setChildren(1, Interface); //Number of sprites/buttons
setBounds(27001, 7, 6, 0, Interface); [/code]

thanks
